Summary: Atiku, AfDB, PRP flag FG’s loan plan despite ‘impressive’ IGR returns . Nigeria's debt conversation pivots in less than a month from being jubilant to huge concern .

Summary: Nigerians recently received some surprising news feeds . A simple run of the headline reads: ‘Teenage apprentice impregnates master’s daughter, nine others in five months’

Title: Post-Tinubu’s endorsement: More questions than answers in ruling APC
Summary: APC National Summit has effectively endorsed President Bola Tinubu for a second term in 2027 . Several pressing internal issues remain unresolved in the ruling party .

Title: Mixed reactions over Shehu Sani’s call for assessment of govs, lawmakers’ performance
Summary: Former Senator Shehu Sani urges Nigerians to assess performance of their state governors and National Assembly representatives . Sani, who represented Kaduna Central, has sparked mixed reactions . The former Senator has urged Nigerians not to focus solely on President Bola Tinubu's administration .

Title: 21 corpses recovered as midnight flood sweeps 50 homes in Niger
Summary: A severe midnight flood caused by torrential rainfall wreaked havoc in Mokwa Local Government Area of Niger State . Scores of people were declared missing, and scores of people declared missing .

Title: WAEC exam in darkness, a national disgrace — Atiku
Summary: Former Vice President Atiku Abubakar has criticised the recent incident where Nigerian students were forced to sit for the West African Senior School Certificate Examination, WASSCE, in dark and unfit conditions, calling it a ‘national disgrace’ The post WAEC exam in darkness, a national disgrace — Atiku .

Title: Inside the Oval Office, Trump’s new Lair, by Azu Ishiekwene
Summary: In 1990, Nelson Mandela was asked why he remained friends with Muammar Gaddafi, Yasser Arafat, and Fidel Castro . He replied that he was friends with Gaddafi, Arafat and Castro . The world has never been short of demagogues and fools, but the remedies have often matched the supply .

Title: Tinubu hails Ogun for hosting world-class sports festival
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has commended the Ogun State Government for hosting a world-class National Sports Festival, as the 22nd edition of the multi-sport event ended in Abeokuta on Thursday . The President also hailed the spirit of the athletes who lit up the state from May 16 to May 30 .

Title: Firm unveils solar cooling platform
Summary: KoolBox has unveiled a solar-powered refrigeration platform designed to tackle Nigeria’s growing food spoilage crisis and the worsening impacts of climate change . Title: Enugu will outdo Gateway Games – Commissioner
Summary: Enugu State’s Commissioner for Youth and Sports, Lloyd Ike Ekweremadu, has promised that the Coal City Games will raise the standard of the National Sports Festival . Title: Retired Oborududu in search of new wrestling talents
Summary: Olympic silver medallist, Blessing Oborududu, says she is on a mission to nurture new wrestling talents for the country after she bowed out of Nigerian wrestling with a gold medal at the 2024 National Sports Festival in Ogun State on Wednesday . Title: A united call to secure Nigeria’s food future
Summary: Food and Agriculture Organisation says 33 million Nigerians are projected to be food insecure in 2025 . Food security is not the responsibility of one actor; it is a shared mission that calls for collaborative action, rooted in effective implementation and driven by inclusion .
